residue.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a substance that remains on a surface, in a container etc and cannot be removed easily, or that remains after a chemical process
residue.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The flies leave a sticky residue on crops.
residue.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the part of something that is left after the rest has gone or been taken away
residue.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The residue of the stock was sold.
